train:
Ngarlu nya. -> You.SG danced.
Gulugba ngu. -> I will sleep.
Bardbi ga bungmanya. -> The old woman ran [away].
Ngunybulugi barrawunguji. -> The doctor has a house.
Ngajbi nginya. -> I saw you.SG.
Dagumajba nguyu ngunybulugi. -> She will strike the doctor.
Alanga gu ngarlujba janjingunya. -> The girl will dance with the dog.
Ngajba gununyu. -> He will see you.SG.
Ngirra nga gijilulu. -> I stole the money.
Yagujba nyu barrawuwaji. -> You.SG will leave him without a house.
Daguma ngiyinga bungmanyani. -> The old woman struck me.
Bardbi ga darranggunguji. -> He ran [away] with the stick.
Alayulu ngiya juwa. -> She found the man.
Juwani gina ngajbi gijilulungunya. -> The man saw her with the money.
Yagu gininga. -> He left me.
Bungmaji gina ngajbi balamurruwaji. -> He saw the old man without a spear.
Dirragba gu bungmaji. -> The old man will jump.
test: The old woman will find you.SG.
